models in Sec. 3.2. 2D denotes auxiliary direct 2D supervision in Sec. 3.3. pt means ImageNet

Table 4. Comparison between different depth losses. Depth Err. 
Med. denotes the average median of depth errors. Foreground 
(Fg in the Table) metrics are evaluated by averaging object-level 
results, where boxes with less than 5 ground-truth LiDAR points 
are ignored.

Table 5. Ablation studies for 2D detection head.  *  only loads pre-
trained weights in conv1, conv2, and conv3.
